product.name: Maybelline Great Lash - Clear
product.description:
Great Lash Clear Washable Mascara is a crystal clear formula that gives a softer, fuller look.The gentle brush separates lashes into a perfect fan. It contains panthenol to condition lashes, glycerin for a soft feel. This is great for shaping and setting brows. Contact lens safe, opthalmologist tested.
